recipe_name: Coconut rice pudding with mango, orange and lime
author: Bill Granger
method: Place the rice, coconut milk, milk, zest, sugar and vanilla in a saucepan over a medium heat and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and cook for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. When the rice is cooked, remove from the heat and leave to cool with the lid on. When the mixture is cold, stir in the cream. Pour into a serving bowl, top with mango and a sprinkling of brown sugar and serve with wedges of lime on the side.
ingredients: 55g/2oz short-grain rice,  230ml/8fl oz coconut milk,  110ml/4fl oz milk,  1 tsp orange zest,  2 tsp caster sugar,  1 tsp vanilla essence,  110ml/4fl oz cream,  mango, sliced,  lime wedges,  2 tsp brown sugar
